short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: one-click navigation to a website's social links

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Chrome plug-in that makes company research a breeze.

Use 1Klick while browsing any website to quickly get insight into their size, funding & customer reviews from the sources you trust.

One-click access to a company's; 
- LinkedIn Profile 
- Crunchbase Page 
- G2 Listing 

One click. No wasted steps.The quickest way to research. ðŸŽ¯
